welcome: Welcome to our Luxury Sportswear E-commerce Website!
hero_slide_1_subtitle: Discover our new collection of premium socks.
hero_slide_2_subtitle: From casual to formal, we have the perfect pair for you.
hero_slide_3_subtitle: Made with the finest materials for ultimate comfort and durability.
hero_slide_4_subtitle: Every purchase helps us support a greater cause.
bestsellers_subtitle: Discover our most loved pieces, designed for peak performance and style.
features_subtitle: Discover why our socks are loved by thousands. We focus on comfort, durability, and style for all-day wear.
ultra_soft_description: Experience unmatched comfort with our premium soft socks.
breathable_description: Keep your feet fresh all day with our breathable fabric.
eco_friendly_description: Made from sustainable materials to protect the environment.
durable_reliable_description: Long-lasting socks that stay comfortable wash after wash.
why_choose_us_subtitle: We are committed to providing the best socks experience with comfort, style, and convenience. Here’s why our customers love us:
premium_quality_description: Our socks are made from high-quality materials ensuring comfort, durability, and style.
fast_delivery_description: Quick and reliable shipping to get your favorite socks delivered to your doorstep.
secure_shopping_description: 100% safe and secure payment options for a worry-free shopping experience.
great_offers_description: Exclusive deals, discounts, and bundle offers to keep your sock drawer happy.
social_cause_text_1: At IN2, we believe luxury and purpose can coexist. For every purchase, we contribute to community wellness programs.
social_cause_text_2: Together, we’re building stronger, healthier communities through movement.
gallery_subtitle: Capturing moments of movement, community, and style

offers.heading: Current Offers & Promotions
offers.description: Don’t miss our exclusive deals! Check out our bundle offers and seasonal discounts.

offer1.title: Buy 3 Get 1 Free
offer1.description: Stock up on your favorite socks! Add 4 pairs to your cart and pay for only 3.

offer2.title: 20% Off on Winter Collection
offer2.description: Keep your feet warm and stylish this winter. Limited-time discount on selected socks.

offer3.title: Bundle Pack: Sports Socks
offer3.description: Grab 5 pairs of sports socks at a special bundle price. Perfect for workouts.

footer.slogan: Luxury in Motion. Where performance meets purpose.
footer.newsletter: Get the latest updates on new products and exclusive offers.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Capturing moments of movement, community, and style through our events and initiatives

wishlist.title: My Wishlist
wishlist.empty_paragraph: Save your favorite items for later

social.title: Movement for Good
social.hero_paragraph: At IN2, we believe luxury and purpose can coexist. Every purchase drives positive change in communities around the world.

initiatives.title: Youth Fitness Programs
initiatives.description: We partner with local communities to provide free fitness training and equipment to underprivileged youth, helping them build confidence, discipline, and healthy habits.

initiatives.title: Sustainable Manufacturing
initiatives.description: Every IN2 product is crafted with sustainability in mind. We use eco-friendly materials and ensure fair labor practices throughout our supply chain.

initiatives.title: Mental Wellness Support
initiatives.description: Physical and mental health go hand in hand. We fund mental wellness workshops and therapy programs in underserved communities, promoting holistic well-being.

social.join_paragraph: Every purchase you make contributes to building healthier, stronger communities. Together, we're creating a movement that transcends fashion.
